post.description: This endpoint is used when a student is applying for a course of study in the university

parameters.name: student_results
parameters.description: JSON array containing multiple student result objects with properties like exam_type_id ,exam_number, exam_date ,image

parameters.name: choice
parameters.description: JSON array containing multiple student course choice objects with properties like faculty_id,department_id

parameters.name: schools_attended
parameters.description: JSON array containing multiple student school attended  objects with properties like school_name , graduation_year, image
